name: Journey of the Greatest Demo
description:
Purge all the evil from your kingdom with your Arcane Art! Follow the journey of a nobody to the greatest in this game. 

Hi everyone! this is the first game that I ever released publicly so there will be bugs, and the purpose of this demo is to get many feedbacks because as a beginner in this community I will really need that. So let me know your feedback and your highest kill combo (mine is 15). 

Credits:

  • Crosx97: Code & Level Design @yt @ig
  • Ramrex: Level Design

Thanks to these wonderful people for their wonderful assets:

  • Tim Beek: BGM (Memorable Beginning)
  • LunaLucid: BGM (Bittersweet Anthem)
  • Anokolisa: Tileset (Taiga Forest and Wood Camp)
  • Pimen: Sprites (Battlemage, Skeleton Enemies, and Effects)
  • LuizMelo: Sprites (Huntress, Wizard, and Martial Hero 2)
  • PaperHatLizard/Cryo: UI (Cryo's Mini GUI)
  • Sasquatchii: UI (Pixel Parchment)
  • Daymarius: Font (Retro Gaming)
